alert.note: Alert for Imperial; Riverside (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 20 at 1:16PM PDT until August 20 at 1:45PM PDT by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 145 PM PDT FOR NORTHWESTERN IMPERIAL AND RIVERSIDE COUNTIES... At 116 PM PDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near North Shore to 6 miles north of Bombay Beach to 20 miles east of Salton City, moving north at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Chiriaco Summit, North Shore, Bombay Beach, and Imperial Hot Mineral Springs. This includes the following highways... CA Interstate 10 between mile markers 74 and 93. CA Route 111 between mile markers 50 and 65. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
